events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures the event of adding a new item to the inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Records when an item is removed from inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Tracks changes made to existing inventory items.

events.name: InventoryCountChecked
events.description: Represents the action of checking the current count of an inventory item.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of adding a new item to the inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Records when an item is removed from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Tracks changes made to existing inventory items.

commands.name: CheckInventoryCount
commands.description: Represents the action of checking the current count of an inventory item.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Supplier Management to handle the sourcing of inventory items.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Link to Order Management for managing incoming and outgoing inventory related to orders.
